name: Dead letters (zzot)
description:
A slightly spooky two player game test performed on a single keyboard. Grab a friend, a significant other or a cat and try to pass the test. Hold the letters that appear on your side of the screen faster than the other subject to score a point. Score enough point to pass the test.

Take the test fullscreen here.

Secret codes:

Press "C" in the home screen to toggle high contrast mode

Known issues:

Sometimes sound is not audible when keys are pressed. It makes the test harder than it should be.

This game was made in two weeks for #WizardJam4
